places_to_visit.name: Timbuktu
places_to_visit.description: Timbuktu is an ancient city located in the Sahara Desert, known for its historical role as a center of trade and Islamic scholarship. Key sites include the Djinguereber Mosque, the Sankore University, and the historic manuscripts housed in local libraries.

places_to_visit.name: Bamako
places_to_visit.description: Bamako is the capital of Mali and a vibrant city with attractions such as the National Museum of Mali, the Grand Mosque, and local markets.

activities: Explore the historic sites of Timbuktu, including the Djinguereber Mosque and Sankore University
